SummaryEnglish: Morihito Otogi, a high school student who comes from a lineage of ogres, enjoys a peaceful, ordinary life until his childhood friend, Nico, moves in with him. Nico is a witch-in-training, and chooses Morihito to be her familiar. While Nico is thrilled to reunite with her old friend and crush, Morihito is tasked with the perilous duty to protect her from a foretold calamity. Between the unpredictable chaos caused by Nico’s magic, and the awkwardness of sharing a home, their lives become a whirlwind of supernatural hijinks and threats.

1.SummaryEnglish: Ogre descendant Morihito begins living with his childhood friend Nico, a novice witch, but he soon has his hands full keeping her out of trouble.

2.TitleEnglish: A Giant Rookie / Let’s Go to a Diner! / The Flying Classroom
2.SummaryEnglish: On the first day of school, Morihito urges Nico to hide the fact that she’s a witch, but she tries using magic to secretly help him out in class.

3.TitleEnglish: Fresh Transparent Fashions for Spring / Witch’s Delivery Service / Lost Dogs and the Patter of Rain
3.SummaryEnglish: Nico’s mother sends Morihito a letter containing a worrying prophecy. Unable to decipher the meaning, Morihito spends the rest of the day on his toes.

4.SummaryEnglish: Kanshi explains that Nico’s mother sent him to protect her. He and Morihito clash, but he takes a moment to warn him of an enemy within the school.

5.TitleEnglish: My Student Is My Favorite Artist / My Tummy Is Tender Today / Cat Scout
5.SummaryEnglish: Closet manga fan Ms. Makuwa loses her composure when she realizes that one of her students is a popular fan artist for her favorite series.

6.SummaryEnglish: After realizing Morihito is getting popular with the girls at school, Nico learns of a so-called lovers’ tree near the site of an upcoming field trip.

7.TitleEnglish: Kan & Nico’s Channel / The Tea Ceremony Is a Piece of Tea Cake
7.SummaryEnglish: Nico and Kanshi start an online video channel, but Morihito is annoyed by their lack of originality and asks their hipster classmate Magami for help.

8.TitleEnglish: Kanshi’s Part-Time Job Diaries ~The Superhero Show~ / Kanshi’s Part-Time Job Diaries ~The Side Job~
8.SummaryEnglish: When Kanshi can’t pay his share of the living expenses, Morihito hands him a flyer from an amusement park hiring performers for a superhero show.

9.TitleEnglish: Dear Kara / New Friends / Date With the Knight
9.SummaryEnglish: Nico and Morihito’s classmate Kara asks them to restore a letter from her deceased mother, which her father put through a paper shredder.

10.TitleEnglish: Trope-tacular Student Council / A Stray Cat’s Bubble of Bliss
10.SummaryEnglish: After a student council vice president makes a dramatic entrance to forbid Nico from using magic, the council’s other larger-than-life members arrive.

11.SummaryEnglish: Kanshi saves Keigo from a bully who claims to be using a candy with a stimulant effect. A self-proclaimed witch appears before Nico and Morihito.

12.SummaryEnglish: A transformed Keigo attacks the isolated Morihito. Surrounded by Wolf's “Dogs,” Kanshi and Nico devise a plan to locate and neutralize the warlock.

13.TitleEnglish: Keigo Magami, the Werewolf / Kind Tiger, Proud Wolf / Easy Spices for Enthralling Cooking
13.SummaryEnglish: Morihito and the others decide to get rid of any crescent-shaped objects to minimize the risk of Keigo transforming into a werewolf in the house.

14.TitleEnglish: Uron Mirage Chapter 119: The Fuzzy Hunt, Part 4 / Diary of My Favorite Artist
14.SummaryEnglish: In Episode 119 of Uron Mirage, swordsmen Utsuro, Oboro, Sagiri and Zack decide to split up and search the buildings of an abandoned research facility.

15.SummaryEnglish: Ibuki’s newest prophecy advises seeking a family that dispels evil. Nico and her friends set out in search, treating the journey like a summer trip.

16.TitleEnglish: Miharu Kiryu, the Vampire / Missing Parasol / I’m So Glad You’re Here
16.SummaryEnglish: Vampire Miharu moves into the Otogi house, but as a night person with different energy needs, he may struggle to adjust to communal living.

17.TitleEnglish: We Got Trapped in a Death Game… (But It Sucked) / Long Long A Go Go
17.SummaryEnglish: Morihito and the other guys awake in an unknown place. A mysterious figure tells them they must play a game — and that Nico is being held hostage.

18.TitleEnglish: Kara and Shiki / Mega Marble Mania Madness / Scramble Scrap Squad
18.SummaryEnglish: Nico and Kukumi help Kara out at the shrine run by her father. When Nico casts a spell to make a paper cat move around, Kara gets an idea.

19.SummaryEnglish: When tidying the house, Morihito finds a letter Nico wrote to him when they were kids. Nico shares her memories of those days with Nemu and the guys.

20.TitleEnglish: The Lost Wolf and the Stray Cat
20.SummaryEnglish: Noticing that Keigo seems sad, Nico gives him a ring imbued with a levitation spell. As he secretly trains to use it, Nemu approaches him.

21.TitleEnglish: Secret Urges / Keiko's Carefree Style / Jekyll Visits the Otogi House
21.SummaryEnglish: As Keigo wonders why his channel isn't getting more views, Nico casts a spell on him that she believes will help make his videos more interesting.

22.TitleEnglish: The Incredible Shrinking Adventure / The Hamazaki Fall Bread Festival / Lucky Birthday
22.SummaryEnglish: While sharing donuts with Kara and Morihito, Nico decides to shrink herself and Morihito down so they can experience eating a giant pastry.

23.TitleEnglish: Our First Offline Meetup / Fave Artist File: Creative Surge / Fave Artist File: Crazy Event Arc
23.SummaryEnglish: When Kukumi mentions that she will be meeting a friend from social media in person for the first time, a worried Ms. Makuwa decides to tail her.

24.TitleEnglish: Moi’s Denim Devotion / Date With the Guide
24.SummaryEnglish: When Morihito declares it's time to give his favorite pair of jeans a second wash, Miharu asks to know more about denim — much to the others' chagrin.

25.SummaryEnglish: It’s almost Asunaro Festival. Nico’s class will be utilizing her magic to run a “haunted café” so you can spend some whimsical time in a cafe full of ghosts. While the class was preparing for the event, Nico was asked by a festival committee member if she could cast some spells during the festival’s opening ceremony. Meanwhile, Kanshi asks Morihito to do a comedy duo on the performance stage.
